Header: Western Troops Clean Mt Lavinia Coastal Belt
Content: To be in consistent with the directive of the acting Chief of Defence Staff and Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva, troops of the 14 Division of the SFHQ-West on the guidelines given by Major General Mahinda Mudalige, Commander SF-West carried out a beach-cleaning project along the most popular Dehiwala-Mt Lavinia coastal belt on Sunday (9). Commander SF-West himself was present at the inauguration of the campaign, joined by sections of environmentalists and civilians.
